website_summaries.verdict: With incredible accuracy, women wishing to start a family now have a better way to chart temperature and predict when ovulation is about to occur.
pros: Discreet design allows user to carry without detection
Stores around 300 readings, which are used to predict optimal conception time
App has cloud storage for all data
Unit beeps when cap is taken off to indicate it's on and ready to use
cons: Sync time between thermometer and app can be very slow

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! It’s so nice that it automatically syncs with the app, so you never have to worry about writing the temp down right away or accidentally forgetting to do so! It also takes my temp more quickly than any thermometer I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.author: SC108

customer_reviews.title: Requires in-app purchases and app permissions are a security risk
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, the "app" they mention a) requires far more access to your phone's data than it needs (including GPS location as well as full internet access...that's suspicious), and b) requires you to pay extra in-app fees! They didn't disclose this at all in the product description. I'm giving it only 1 star because of the deceptiveness and the security risk for your phone.
customer_reviews.author: PGVF

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t connect. Useless.
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer will not connect to my phone app. It says that it is “paired” but not “connected” and I have tried everything to troubleshoot it. It connected for 2-3 days then completely shut off and will not connect. It is completely useless without the ability to connect via Bluetooth because you can’t even read your temperature and record it manually - there is no screen on the thermometer that reads your temperature. This was a complete waste of time and money. I’m very disappointed. Update - After trying to connect so many times, I deleted the app, re-downloaded it and restarted my phone.... now it won’t even pair, much less connect! Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for Monitoring Basal Temps!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this device for the past 4 months to read and record my basal temperature. It takes a few minutes to get a reading but it took all the stress out of recording my temps. With a regular thermometer, I was waking up, turning on my IPhone flashlight, waking up my husband, and then opening other various apps to record my results. With this device, I could literally fall asleep with it in my mouth and then enter my temperature into other apps later. I didn’t like the added features on the app aside from the LH recording, but I would still recommend it to anyone looking for an effective way to monitor basal temps. I’m now pregnant! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: They started charging a subscription for the app!!
customer_reviews.text: After months of using the app for free with the purchase of the femometer device, the company decided to lock all the features that were previously included and charge a subscription of $80 per year for it. Its not even newly developed features that are being charged for, its the same old features but now with a price tag. Super messed up :/ I gave the device 2 stars because the device itself isnt bad (except it does take way too long to take your temp and the device will say you need to replace your battery but it will last a good month after that).
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't order this thermometer to try to get pregnant, I ordered it to naturally prevent pregnancy and also gain insight into my feminine health. I have polycystic ovarian syndrome, and I have been trying to naturally get it under control. Normally I never knew when my period was coming, but now I can predict when it will be here and understand my cycle better. No longer do I feel like I am in the dark with my own body. I also love that it has an app that I can use to keep track of all of the data. I love this thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Newlin

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been temping for many years both for TTC and TTA and have gone through many cheap BBT thermometers. I love that this one syncs to my phone and keeps track of everything. The app is simple to use. I have found that it sometimes isn’t connected to my phone right away but since it keeps record of temps for a decent timeframe it isn’t too much of a pain. I do wish that it had a digital screen on it to read it right away, but honestly for the price, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kris780

customer_reviews.title: Not at all accurate and I think mine was used
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this for BBT tracking and I could take temp after temp and they would be whole degrees off right after each other. No accuracy. Would not recommend for BBT. Also, I think I got a used one? There was an old rusty battery stuck to the paper work inside? It was weird. I meant to return it but waited to long so I’m just out $30. :/
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: Unit I received did not come with instructions, and is missing a battery.
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received did not come with printed instructions. It does not have any LCD display, it must be paired with a smartphone and app to give you a temperature reading. I had to lookup instructions online. It wouldn't pair with my phone. Troubleshooting guide said check battery placement. I popped open the battery cover and found that it had no battery in it. They shipped it without a battery! I don't even know what kind of battery I would buy. Also, the app that you are forced to use will only work if you enable GPS location tracking. Utter garbage, POS, trash device.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Track
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this product is to use. The fact that it syncs up with an app on my phone takes the stress out of trying to find a pen and paper each morning to record your temperature before it disappears from a normal thermometer. The app has other nice features that help you track your cycle. It also tracks your LH tests and Cervical Mucus and gives you the option to attach pictures to everything. I've have been using it for a week now and have been very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Husmann

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Only works when the app works. Tried getting my reading several different mornings and my reading didn’t sync. Not worth the money. Better off using the standard thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this thermometer and the app! I have been tracking my menstrual cycle for the past 7 months and using the thermometer consistently for the past 3 months. It is great to use and very easy i dont even turn on the light to temp. I just temp and go back to sleep and update my app whenever i wake back up!
customer_reviews.author: Ayisha

customer_reviews.title: Only buy this for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the height of the Covid pandemic, since all regular oral thermometers were sold out. Unfortunately, I did not realize the extent to which this product is strictly designed for monitoring ovulation. The thermometer itself does not include a temperature read-out. Instead, it must transmit the temperature to the separate hand-held monitor via Bluetooth (hence requiring pairing each time it is used). I am sure it is a great tool for those wishing to become pregnant (or avoid pregnancy), but it has no redeeming merit for simply taking one's temperature.....even if it is the last thermometer on the market. Now that thermometers are reappearing on shelves, I will be able to find a simple, old-fashioned one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design and quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, the quality of their products and costumer service, they have many products that synch to the same app so it is easy to keep track of everything in the same place. This thermometer is beautiful, and having the bluetooth simplified my life I only need yo wake up to take the temp and everything else is done by the app, I use the thermometer along with their strips to track the exact day of ovulation and it is very precise. We are trying to conceive so this is making this process easier. I recommend this product you wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea p

customer_reviews.title: Returned this
customer_reviews.text: In theory this is a good idea. However, for some reason the Bluetooth stopped connecting the thermometer to my phone just 2 days in. Quite frustrating. Could be from my own WiFi issues, but that alone says enough that a traditional digital thermometer gets the job done with no worries. My tracking (for ovulation) is now totally off until the new one arrives since I’m returning this.
customer_reviews.author: K New

customer_reviews.title: I Loved this product until this morning
customer_reviews.text: I Loved this product until this morning. My phone got a message that said the app could "damage my device" I figured it just needed to be updated. I uninstalled it to reinstall it. I can't find the app anywhere. It is no longer on Google play store. :-( What do I do with the thermometer now? I can't' even retrieve all my data from before. Can I return it since there is NO use for it anymore :-(
customer_reviews.author: Rg

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use ridiculously expensive
customer_reviews.text: The app interface is ridiculous. I successfully took my temperature once and then never could again. - I hate that there is no button or display on this overpriced thermometer. - It was incredibly inaccurate claiming I was hypothermic - it took 2 minutes and 50 seconds to read my temperature - My husband couldn't take his temperature at all. You click bbt then there is no option to read your temperature it only gives you the option to enter a temperature. You're better off with a meat thermometer at least it would actually read your temperature.
customer_reviews.author: John.P.

customer_reviews.title: great product and company
customer_reviews.text: awesome company. so i bought this and was using it for a few months before i somehow broke it. it works just like it says and beeps when it’s open and when your temp is taken so u don’t have to open your eyes in the morning to take your temp. well mine stopped beeping and when i tried to upload my temps it didn’t work. so i emailed asking about sending it in to be fixed and they sent me another! so awesome and thx u to them. but i would definitely recommend this product. the only thing i would ask for in the future is the ability to link to other apps.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The app is a pain in the butt at the best of times. Constantly disconnects and forgets the device which is frustrating to deal with when you’re already waking up early to take your temperature. The battery died after one week of use, replacements are expensive. I’m going back to an old school bbt thermometer and just manually entering the temp into a different tracking app. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: I hate this product
customer_reviews.text: You need to download and use the app to use it at all. I input the battery and it doesn’t work so likely the battery is dead, but the piece to remove the battery is smaller than my tiny fingernail and there is no way it is coming out so I’m just left with a $40 pink stick that doesn’t function. I contacted customer support and they said to replace the battery... even though the one they sent was dead. I literally can’t even if I wanted to, that battery slot is not coming back out.
customer_reviews.author: Icca

customer_reviews.title: Directions need some work
customer_reviews.text: The device is fairly easy to use and once you sync up the thermometer, it seems to work just fine. The directions aren't clear or correct grammar. Also, the directions for putting in the battery are opposite of what really needs to happen, meaning it just needs to go in upside down of what instructions say. This is cool and all but a regular thermometer would work just fine. Now it's a nifty tool in my pocket though. Here's to fingers crossed I can get pregnant now I have more tools to help.
customer_reviews.author: bdlong

customer_reviews.title: Impossible
customer_reviews.text: For me using this as directed is impossible. I wake up and have to pee, and oh crap I forgot to do the thing.... It's not convenient and I ended up just going on the pill. I didn't want to take hormones, but I'm taking the lowest dose available option and it has zero negative effects on me. Unless you can be militant in your self-discipline literally the instant you wake up every single morning, maybe just pull a page from my book and take the pill instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not come loaded in it, and once it’s loaded it does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. The battery does not come loaded into the thermometer. You have to do it yourself and it’s not easy. I finally loaded the battery in and it still doesn’t work. The little instrument to take the battery tray out isn’t working either. What a waste of money and time and disappointing for a product that’s supposed to help people. I’m going to try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cece86

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! This is litterally the worst thing ive ever spent my money on. It does not have a screen and half the time it never syncs up with your phone. Everything you read about taking your basal temp says your supposed to take it before getting out of bed or moving. This product literally takes 10+ min to finally get a reading plus your body temp is alrealy elvated because at the time you finally get a reading your irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Device and app both work great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great up until I accidentally left it at a hotel. I can still use the app without the thermometer, though I’m seriously considering re-purchasing it. It’s nice that it automatically syncs with the app so you don’t have to wake all the way up to look at a display and jot down numbers. The app itself is nice and is getting even better over time. If you’re researching which basal thermometer to use and you’ve made it to this review, seriously consider trying out this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jess K

customer_reviews.title: Femometer as Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Basically a panic purchase as our thermometer broken in midst of COVID-19 and you can’t find a thermometer in a store anywhere. It seems well built, and I guess it’s accurate but hard to tell unless you have a $1000 medical thermometer. Set up was kludgy. It’s if course designed for woman getting pregnant, I just needed a simple thermometer. For its intended purpose it seems as if it would work quite well though..
customer_reviews.author: Darren MacAlester

customer_reviews.title: Works but Bluetooth connection always disconnects
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - you can choose low,medium,high volume for the beeping of the thermometer.. I like the low volume setting because it doesn’t wake up my fiancé. - the reading of your temperature automatically logs in the Femometer App. - doesn’t take too long to get a reading (*the instructions tell you it takes a little bit longer when you first start using it because it has to get to know you*) Cons: - there’s no screen on the actual thermometer to see what your temperature is without looking at the app. - the thermometer is always disconnecting from the app, so I’m continuously having to reconnect the thermometer to the app to sinc my temperature readings
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Technical problems so I returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. Don't like that the ONLY place you can see your temp is on the app- not on the device at all. But the biggest problem is that the device constantly unpairs from the phone and who wants to constantly pair unpair install uninstall?
customer_reviews.author: Elle T

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this thing. This and the app are SO easy to use. I used this along with the ovulation/pregnancy kit and it worked like a charm! Basically waited until my temp was going up to test my ovulation, and sure, enough I was. Then noticed right before my period that my temp was spiking so I took a pregnancy test and it was POSITIVE!! Honestly had I taken it a day earlier, it probably wouldn’t have shown up, but thanks to this handy dandy thing, I knew when to test! I still track my temp everyday just to make sure everything’s as it should be!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: Not only great thermometer, but amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I had this thermometer for 2 years. I used it right before I got pregnant, stopped using it for a year and a half, and resumed using it a few weeks ago. I love the app and how easy it is to use. The battery died and for some reason the thermometer stopped working when I replaced the battery. I contacted customer service and they not only send me a new thermometer, but a Vinca II (upgrade). I am grateful for their support and willingness to replaced a 2 yr old thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this thermometer but it definitely has its pros and cons. With the price, I was hoping it came with the premium subscription but it does not. I have to spend a good amount of time getting it to connect via Bluetooth in the morning. It does not do so automatically which is a bummer. I like that it’s Bluetooth and I don’t have to input my temp. The app is cool but I could’ve spent half the price and just manually put in my temp every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Okay for BBT
customer_reviews.text: It's okay to use. I'm just having difficulty using the app's OPK tracker, it's difficult aligning it with the capture box. The thermometer also takes a while. Overall it does what it needs to do. The Bluetooth makes recording easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Best BBT Thermometer so far
customer_reviews.text: This BBT thermometer was a little pricier compared to the others. So, I bought a different brand. It stopped working after a bit. Then, a second brand - but that one did not have a light to help me measure in the dark. This one was great because whether or not I plan to really get up at 5 am (the time I measure every day), I can get the measurement and fall back asleep without worrying that I will forget to record. It records the measurement automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Jabel Erica O.  Bercasio

customer_reviews.title: Device Keeps Disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: A compact device for quickly measuring body temperatures. My only complaint is that it doesn’t stay connected to the app. Instead, each time you open up the app, you need to manually connect to the device again, which is quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use... I can keep my eyes closed and go back to sleep easily if I want. I've been practicing NFP for 15 years, and I just purchased this thermometer. Love it. My old non-bluetooth thermometer broke and I tried two different thermometers which were not accurate before splurging on this. Worth every penny - accuracy is a must-have in my book for practicing NFP effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Klapatauskas

customer_reviews.title: Battery life seems to be just fine, and the thermometer itself is very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed! Makes temping SO much easier! Battery life seems to be just fine, and the thermometer itself is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the fact that you MUST use their app and allow them to access your location, photos, etc. Nowhere in the description did it say anything about that.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It seems like I'm one of the few people that uses this device to NOT get pregnant, but I think it works great. Sometimes the bluetooth has trouble pairing which can get annoying to have to re-pair every so often, but this device is the first thing to ever predict my cycle accurately to the day. I love knowing exactly when my period is and when I'm ovulating (it was always a guessing game prior to it). I wish I can see the temp on the actual device but not a big deal. The app also tracks way more than your temperature so it's a really detailed breakdown of your cycle.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Great product and app !
customer_reviews.text: I only have one complaint but it's not with the product. To get an accurate reading of your BBT you need at least 6 hours of.solid sleep, which is hard with a new baby so I cant always use it. The product its self is really easy to use. I love that you can use it even with irregular periods, you dont have to have the app open to use it like similar products and the app has tons of features !!!
customer_reviews.author: perlamar88

customer_reviews.title: Will not sync to Bluetooth. Therefor useless
customer_reviews.text: I just took it out of the package, read the instructions. No matter what I do, it will not sync with the blue tooth (restarted my phone, reopened the cap, it’s right next to my phone) and therefore and I cannot use this device. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a month now and I like it a lot! It doesn’t take long at all in the mornings to take my temperature and I download it onto the app later in the day. Really, all you have to do is connect the fermometer to the Bluetooth on your phone and it shows the temperature of that day right away when you open the free app. It’s so nice to have the chart laid out for you on the app and the percentage chance of getting pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Alldredge

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want to pay a $9.95 monthly fee
customer_reviews.text: After 7 day free trial, you have to pay a $9.95 a month subscription !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernard S. Giloni

customer_reviews.title: Buy the updated one.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time and money. Does not work. I got the first one. It was defective right out of the package. So I ordered a replacement. It came and again. Defective. I purchased new batteries in the hopes it was just a dead battery. Nope. No beep when taken top is taken off. Will not sync to my phone. Don't waste your money. Edit to add. They sent me a new updated version and it works. Don't buy this one. Buy the one with the digital screen on it.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Wake up 5 in the morning just to try to take my temp. It constantly says cannot pair even though it is already connected. Supposed to be easier than the manual temps. Multiple times I woke up real early to take it just to see it didn’t log in the app. I would write it down manually but it’s literally just a stupid pink stick with magic Bluetooth powers. So annoying ! Returned mine and swapped it for the cheaper one and will be doing this without an app now. Old fashioned way
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: It Feels Cheap and is Slow
customer_reviews.text: The material just feels cheap and dinky. It took a very long time to connect to my phone every morning, sometimes it didn’t and then took a longer than normal time to get my temp. Sometimes 5-8 min! I stuck with it until both batteries ran out and then purchased a different thermometer from the same company that I like a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Emma Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It works but its not great
customer_reviews.text: Has no digital readout so you have to open the app to check your temp. After the first two or three readings it would only register the temp was taken if the app was open. Overall i would pick a different product. My wife would take her temp from bed and it was a pain. Get something with a digital readout that also pairs with an app. Spend a few extra dollars. It worked and seemed accurate so its not totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: First Femometer stopped working after a month and a half. Customer service was good with replacing the Femometer (hence the two stars) but the replacement came and it takes forever to finally take the temp. I know I am taking my temperature properly and that the battery and software are as they should be. I have emailed customer service, but I think my days as a Femometer user are over.
customer_reviews.author: A.barton428

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. You must use the (free) app to know what your temperature is, there is no display screen. You can't connect it to any other app service. The app has very few functions (it really just stores your temp data). It'd be cheaper and just as easy to use a $15 Basal Thermometer and input the data to a more aubstantial app yourself.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to learn what my cycles may possibly be like as I have irregular. I was looking forward to tracking my cycle, learning when I was ovulating, and in the future conceive a baby... I was disgusted knowing I had to pay a membership just to do these things. I also could not connect several times, I logged my period and it kept deleting the info, it never woke me up because it was disconnected. All in all this product was one of those "too good to be true products". Shipping it back asap.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Could use some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Great product I like that it automatically syncs to your device. What would be helpful though is if there could be a function to where if you didn't have a device or didn't want to open the app for whatever reason. If it could show you your temp on the thermometer. Unless you have the app or open it you have no way of knowing what it was. Personally I think it's quite expensive to not be able to see your temp without the app.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Mistakenly took the one without the screen
customer_reviews.text: It's a great thermometer...only thing is, I mistakenly picked this one because I wanted to pick the one with the screen so I can be able to see the numbers myself..in case the phone has a problem because the phone is the only place you can find out the bbt after the thermometer sync the numbers in .. but now it's too late, cause they already send me the one without the little screen..
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Sibera

customer_reviews.title: Not so simple
customer_reviews.text: Not very user friendly. Won't work without me signing up for some type of paid account. I expected this to be simple, easy and user friendly. I don't have the patience to figure it out. If it's not easy I know I won't use it, which completely defeats it's purpose!
customer_reviews.author: AngelEmm

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly helpful for trying to get pregnant.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer and app. The app provides insight and suggestions to help with getting pregnant including when to do LH test and when to time intercourse. It’s a great way to track your cycle symptoms, various tests, view your basal body temp visually, and organize trying to get pregnant. Highly recommended! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Need app to use
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few minutes to try to figure out how to see the temperature in the app (it does not show it on the thermometer). Once I figured it out, it was great! Also shipped out very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stallsmith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had returned this thing while I had the chance, but I was in the middle of a move. I don’t recommend this thermometer because it is all through WiFi- there isn’t even a number that shows up on the thermometer. So you have to go through the app on your phone to see your temperature, and most of the time it doesn’t even transmit.low quality piece of ****
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay for the app or it’s no good
customer_reviews.text: I understanding needing to pay for the app to have predictions and suggestions etc... but I can’t even read the temperature without the app. I paid for 3 months and didn’t find it useful and now the thermometer is pointless. It’s just disheartening that women can go through such hard times trying to conceive and then have to deal with this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah London

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging and how easily it syncs with the Femometer app. I wished it had a screen though to show the reading without having to connect it to the app. I also like that when you’ve synced it with the app, you can select the volume level, measurement mode and also set an alarm to remind you to take the reading. It’s a great product and I will definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nenye

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this daily for almost a year to prevent pregnancy after I quit birth control. It’s amazing! I’ve learned so much about my body while using it. I recently lost a piece to the thermometer and contacted customer service who quickly responded and sent me a new one. I’m very happy with the product and customer service! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: The comeback
customer_reviews.text: The newest device is amazing. It has been everything I could of asked for! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: T McGee

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Needed a thermometer since all of them were brought up from every pharmacy and store. Accurately tells me and records my temperature. Has not predicted my period or ovulation cycle yet, so not sure if I'm at risk of getting pregnant.......which is good since I'm a male.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to order because of some of the reviews and I should have trusted my instinct. For this price this thing should work so much better. It came with a battery because I guess it’s common for the included one to go dead quickly. It showed it was full when I got it so I thought I’d get some time out of it. Nope. It was too low to use the second day I tried. Then it worked about five days and stopped completely. Feels cheap and is t worth it. Just buy a regular BBT and insert results on a chart or app. This thing is a rip off and I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the simplicity and convenience for "first thing in the morning" use. Even if it doesn't connect first try, your thermometer will still save your reading so you can upload once you're out of bed. The app is great, still learning how to read my own charting--been using it less than a month. Would definitely recommend the saliva microscope as well as a backup if using for pregancy prevention like I am
customer_reviews.author: Minkamoosamunkamouse

customer_reviews.title: A thermometer with no temp display
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to see the temperature without installing the app, from China, and the app requires you to allow it access to your GPS. Who knows what other data it is gathering. There is no way I would buy or use this product if it wasn't the only thermometer I could get during the outbreak.
customer_reviews.author: AnnA

customer_reviews.title: Cool Thermometer even cooler App
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is exactly as pictured. You must have the app to view temperatures but the app is the coolest part. The thermometer sends your temperatures to the app and charts them for you. You’re able to add additional records including pictures of OPK sticks if you are using them. It analyzes your temperature charts and will give you an optimized view that removes irregularities due to measuring time, missed temps, etc. **Update: after 3 months of temping and charting using this thermometer, I’m pregnant with twins! Using this tool made me feel like I had control and valuable knowledge when it came to trying for a baby. Will definitely continue to use post baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: Helpful tool in our fertility journey!
customer_reviews.text: I used this basel thermometer and the clearblue ovulation detection kit and after two months we got a positive pregnancy test! The app and user instructions were really easy to follow. I would recommend using an additional fertility app along side this one. This app wasn't the easiest to follow. I mainly used it to compare it to my fertility app and clearblue testing app. All three read the same for me on when I would ovulate. This was a helpful piece to pur pregnancy journey! I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: This item is super easy to use- once you get the battery in. The battery was kind of a pain to get in right the holder then into the thermometer. Once I passed that challenge the app set up and daily use is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I never take the time to write reviews but this product needs to stop being sold. The app that you need to use this thermometer DOES NOT WORK. Gets to a certain point and will not load/save data. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling several times, and this thermometer is useless without the app as there is no digital read out. Very disappointed in this and returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Takes something complicated and makes it simple
customer_reviews.text: This little thermometer and the coordinating app are genius! They have taken something that is generally made so complicated and made it not only simple but convenient as well. I had tried physical charting with a regular thermometer, and it was so easy to mess up or lose. This does all the work for you, and makes it so easy to interpret. The fertility world has stayed old-school for far too long, and this thermometer is changing that! Well worth the small investment!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ririe

customer_reviews.title: easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly! easy to set up and pair. I really like being able to temp without having to read a tiny screen in the dark. The app is a little strange, and I wish it connected with the apple health app. I tested it against my other BBT thermometer and this one is always lower. Not sure what the issue is with that, if it's my other thermometer or this one. But hopefully it's at least consistent. I like how easy it is to connect to the app and record data. This is my third cycle using it. Never had any issues with it pairing. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this Femometer - Smart Basal Thermometer for a few weeks now and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Femometer - Smart Basal Thermometer for a few weeks now and have overall been pleased. I mainly got this as a way to check my temp, with the added bonus of keeping track of ovulation days. Each morning I try to remember to check my temp, which takes about 2-3 minutes, which is a little long. You are also able to keep track of weight, mood, periods, etc which is pretty cool and helpful. This linked up to me Galaxy S8 with no problems at all and has been very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Overall great device
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love it, but I would prefer to see the temperature as I’m taking it. Occasionally my phone won’t connect to the device and I can’t tell if it’s taken the temp. The beep is pretty low for me to hear. Will save up for the one with the display.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, takes FOREVER to get a reading, etc etc
customer_reviews.text: 1. It is unbelievable to me how long it takes to get a reading from this thing, even on the fastest setting. 2. The volume of the beep is completely inconsistent. 3. It doesn’t make any sense why I can’t also read the temp directly on the thermometer. I didn’t quite catch this before I purchased it. 4. It’s annoying that I can turn the app to landscape view for viewing my temp chart but not just for normal viewing of the app. 5. With this pandemic, I was forced to by an overpriced BBT thermometer for fertility tracking... and this was it.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: So far, the thermometer works just fine. It pairs well and doesn't take long to take my temperature. My only real gripe with it is how many times it beeps. Though the beep is quiet, it beeps when you take the cap on or off and beeps 3 times when it's finished testing your temperature. That much sound is grating for first thing in the morning and always wakes my boyfriend up to.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: love the color choice
customer_reviews.text: love the color choice, this is the only basal temperature themometer on the market which provides pink as well as other bright and cute colors. Well designed easy to use, clean, store and transfer the data. customer service is really fast and almost real time. the reason for a 4.5 instead of 5 star is that I found the basal temperature I measured on a daily basis sometimes go up and sometimes go down, but this probably is due to me waking up usually at different time in the morning or my cycle is kind of unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: i am pretty disappointed that such a simple product gave me such a hard time to work properly. i still can’t get this device to connect to my phone and i’ve tried many different ways and have even deleted the app and re download to see if that would change anything but something is wrong with its bluetooth and it won’t connect to my phone. and i know it’s this device bc my phone will connect to any other bluetooth device but this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella lee

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I had another basal thermometer that I had to manually upload after it was done reading my temperature. I hated having to try to figure out the right buttons to push while half asleep. With this thermometer, it automatically uploads and I am able to keep my eyes closed! And it reads my temperature faster than my previous thermometer, huge plus. Works great for me..and I love the rose gold color.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Shin

customer_reviews.title: Work great until it didn't....then started working again
customer_reviews.text: (update) Should have known when it arrived and it felt so cheap. Worked for two months and just stopped. Replaced the battery and tried everything. $40 wasted. (update) after about 48 hours of not working, the thermometer started working again. Two starts because of the inconvenience of the "breakdown" moved it to 3 because of the customer service during the failure.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn K

customer_reviews.title: Weak Bluetooth but accurate predictions
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem with this device is that it doesn’t load my temp in the app unless I open my app near the same time I take my temp, or open the thermometer near my phone with the app open later on. I’ll have few days sometimes between loading my temps. Maybe I need a better routine. This is my third month using the Femometer and it successfully predicted my period to the day this time, with the other predictions being within a couple days. I do think it’s pretty decent value for the money. Just a little irritating to use. I think it comes down to the technology and the strength of the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Foundmercy

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t work work a SH@T. I wouldn’t buy one again. Annoyed I can’t return it. Would give zero stars because this product is application based and has ZERO function outside of that.
customer_reviews.author: Girlytattoos

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is pretty good. I decided to pay for the premium to get analytics for ttc and have found that to not be useful (going to use for a few more months and see if it gets better)... the customer support is awfulllll. Don’t expect your questions to be answered... I simply asked how to delete a cycle that was showing as lasting for eight months within the app and still don’t know how to do so. Other than that for the price it seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Cubria

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and does what it says
customer_reviews.text: packaging was really secure and cute, the design in general is nice. The amount of time it took to take my temperature was a bit long but it did mention that would be case for the first couple of times. Everything easily connected to the app and synced up. The only thing that could be nicer about it is if could be used as a stand alone thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Predicted I had PCOS before my DR even knew!
customer_reviews.text: It will adjust your ovulation date according to your temps!! It will also adjust the date according to the picture of your lh ovulation test!!! I've used 3 fertility apps and this one is the absolute best!!! It is so smart on predicting ovulation and the app even knew I had PCOS a month before my doctor officially diagnosed me with It! It also told me I had a lp deficiency. Best fertility app ive ever had ive been using it for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jenroseduncan

customer_reviews.title: My homeopathic physician recommended I use this every morning to chart my temperature ...
customer_reviews.text: My homeopathic physician recommended I use this every morning to chart my temperature in relation to my unbalanced hormones. It worked great! I contemplated on purchasing the Kindara thermometer but did not want to spend too much, they also charge for a monthly or annual fee for using their app. So I quickly opted out of that one! The app for Fermometer works just as well! you can track your monthly cycles AND temperatures for free!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Thank you femometer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool for trying to conceive. It made tracking my ovulation super easy, always connected fast (i have wifi at home), and way easier than manual logging. Thanks to this wonderful little thermometer, we are expecting! After just 3 cycles! Try it! For me it was worth 10 times the cost! It turned 3 years of trying, into 3 months and then success!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Monthly fee for app?!!
customer_reviews.text: Had I known I would need to pay a monthly fee for the app I would have just bought the $10 one and write the temps down each day. The app will keep your temp by day but you get no graphs or any analysis like I thought I would be getting. Personally think it’s a waste as I’m not paying a monthly fee. That’s why I paid for the increased thermometer. I thought I was getting what I needed from the app!! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L.

customer_reviews.title: All over really great product.
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this product. I like the look of the app, the functionality, and all the additional information they provide about women's topics. It syncs perfectly with the app on my phone. Saves past history so you don't have to upload daily if you don't want to. Good size. Power lasts forever & no batteries needed. I've dropped it 2x and no damage either. I'd refer to anyone looking for natural BC or wanting pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H

customer_reviews.title: ... product for almost two weeks now and I really love it. It's storing ability makes it easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for almost two weeks now and I really love it. It's storing ability makes it easy to just wake up, take my temp, go back to sleep, and then sync my temp later. I love it. I've been having issues being able to track my cycle since I got off of Nexplanon birth control and I'm hoping this will help!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rodabaugh

customer_reviews.title: False advertising - app $10/month
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this lol. Bluetooth has shotty connectivity. Worst part is the app isn’t free.... it’s $10 a month if you want to use this thing lolllllllll. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Bluetooth pairing
customer_reviews.text: I love that this thermometer is Bluetooth so I don’t have to turn in the light and squint at tiny numbers in the morning. Pairing with my phone later in the day makes measuring easy and convenient. I would prefer to be able to see the temperature readout without pairing, but I’m willing to deal with that small inconvenience. The app for the thermometer is easy to understand and has many options to track health information, including mood. At this point the app does not seem to analyze any of that information to give you feedback, but it can be helpful to review things like headaches during your cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, elegant little carrying case
customer_reviews.text: This looks so much more beautiful than the photo. It can be very intense, trying to use a pregnancy thermometer. Helps if it looks like an elegant little accessory.
customer_reviews.author: purple rain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This digital thermometer has been good for me, I am trying to have another baby and with the app and the timer I can read my BBT and everything stays in the app because it is with bluetooth I do not have to put anything manual now wait to get pregnant I hope that be soon
customer_reviews.author: Damaris V.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got this on April 18th it easy to use the Bluetooth connection is strong and the app is easy to understand. Update:July 18th 2020 Well I have successfully started ovulating with this little device and Metformin my body is becoming normal and this device accurately predicted my period and my ovulation. Yay!!! It felt good to have a normal period again
customer_reviews.author: Jeanisha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for 47 days and I love it. It’s so easy to use and I don’t have to worry about missing my information since it’s automatically uploaded. I love the cycle interpretation with the app upgrade, it’s worth the extra cost!!
customer_reviews.author: aerhoden

customer_reviews.title: Helped me learn my ovulation schedule!! BFP
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for a month & some change and was able to concieve! This device how do you find out basal temperature every morning and I was able to notice what’s the temperature began to rise. I had no idea When I ovulated so this device helped me notice when I was coming close to ovulation.
customer_reviews.author: Shanine

customer_reviews.title: Good device, but difficult for Android users to download
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer is nice and user friendly. Not knowing, a family member and I both bought it and were using it at the same time. We compared our apps and they look a little different (we both have Androids). The link I was sent to download it did not work. Luckily, my husband is quite tech savvy and helped me find it and I was able to download it. This was the only downside of the product and I hope the makers of this product can fix this bug for Android users.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane C.

customer_reviews.title: best BBT ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this. we had been trying for 6 months, then using the femometer we got pregnant the 2nd month using it! I thought it was awesome it tracked my temp through early pregnancy, I have used other BBT with other pregnancies, but the femometer is by far the best I have ever used!! I recommend it to my friends who are TTC
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Love the tracking
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this product. I’ve used it for the last 5 cycles and I haven’t had problems with the app that some people have. My battery barely died and my package didn’t come with a replacement so I had to wait about 5 days to get my new batteries in. But still it has been so great for me!
customer_reviews.author: KRMA

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 weeks . Won’t connect to app
customer_reviews.text: Used the thermometer for 3 weeks and now it broke . I emailed the company and they said they will ship and new one yet I haven’t received anything . Update: They sent me a new meter. Actually one better then the one I had. Not sure if I got a lemon from Amazon. Because the packaging on the new one was more in tack. Very please with the customer service . Thank you for replacing .
customer_reviews.author: frank amodeo

customer_reviews.title: Subscription is needed for accurate predictions
customer_reviews.text: As long as you are familiar with what your temperature changing means for your cycle or plan to pay a monthly fee, I would keep looking. This thermometer and app is convenient as it syncs to your phone, however unless you pay the monthly subscription, it won't correctly predict where you are in your cycle. I still use mine but pay attention to my temperature readings to determine where I am in my cycle and ignore what it says because it is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have been temping for about 2 years, and it's been stressfull. I love that I don't even have to open my eyes to take my temp, so I can fall right back asleep. I used to wake up, see my temp and then not be able to sleep because I couldn't stop thinking about it. Now I don't have that problem!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

product_meta.title: Basal Thermometer for Ovulation, Smart Quiet BBT Thermometer with Bluetooth for Nature Family Planning, Fertility Monitor and Period Tracker with Femometer APP (iOS & Android) from Femometer Vinca
feature_bullets: ✅Automatic Bluetooth transmission: temperature data is automatically transmitted to the App via Bluetooth. The App can generate BBT curves and intelligently analyse women’s menstruation, ovulation and fertile phases

✅Accurate and fast measurement: the measurements have a resolution of 0.01°C. Measurement can be completed in as short as 30 seconds. Fully automatic data transmission and recording will completely eliminate the possibility of error caused by manual recording

✅User-friendliness: there is no button and no switch. It is ready for measurement as soon as the lid is pulled out. It will enter into power-saving sleep mode as soon as the lid is on again. Every morning, it takes only about 1 minute of your time to complete the measurement. The thermometer itself can store 300 sets of temperature data, which can be synchronized to the App on your phone at any time

✅Unique design: simple yet stylish. Its lipstick-like design is tailored for women. There is no need to worry about people noticing your little secret of trying for a baby or trying not to any more. The thermometer comes with an alarm. The sound is soft and its volume is adjustable. You don’t have to worry about waking up your partner who might be sound asleep.

✅Satisfactory Service: From the date of receipt, we provide a 1-year service for quality-related issues. A refund or free return is acceptable, and we provide lifetime customer service to ensure your problem is fully resolved. If you have any questions, please contact us through Amazon email or email to support@femometer.com, we will reply within 24 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
